00079 static void image_verify_buffer_float(Image *ima, ImBuf *ibuf, int color_manage)
00080 {
00081     /* detect if we need to redo the curve map.
00082      * ibuf->rect is zero for compositor and render results after change 
00083      * convert to 32 bits always... drawing float rects isn't supported well (atis)
00084      *
00085      * NOTE: if float buffer changes, we have to manually remove the rect
00086      */
00087 
00088     if (ibuf->rect_float && (ibuf->rect == NULL || (ibuf->userflags & IB_RECT_INVALID)) ) {
00089         if (color_manage) {
00090             if (ima && ima->source == IMA_SRC_VIEWER)
00091                 ibuf->profile = IB_PROFILE_LINEAR_RGB;
00092         }
00093         else
00094             ibuf->profile = IB_PROFILE_NONE;
00095 
00096         IMB_rect_from_float(ibuf);
00097     }
00098 }
00099 
00100 static void draw_render_info(Scene *scene, Image *ima, ARegion *ar)
00101 {
00102     RenderResult *rr;
00103     
00104     rr = BKE_image_acquire_renderresult(scene, ima);
00105 
00106     if (rr && rr->text) {
00107         ED_region_info_draw(ar, rr->text, 1, 0.25);
00108     }
00109 
00110     BKE_image_release_renderresult(scene, ima);
00111 }

00113 /* used by node view too */
00114 void ED_image_draw_info(ARegion *ar, int color_manage, int channels, int x, int y,
00115                         const unsigned char cp[4], const float fp[4], int *zp, float *zpf)
00116 {
00117     char str[256];
00118     float dx = 6;
00119     /* text colors */
00120     /* XXX colored text not allowed in Blender UI */
00121     #if 0
00122     unsigned char red[3] = {255, 50, 50};
00123     unsigned char green[3] = {0, 255, 0};
00124     unsigned char blue[3] = {100, 100, 255};
00125     #else
00126     unsigned char red[3] = {255, 255, 255};
00127     unsigned char green[3] = {255, 255, 255};
00128     unsigned char blue[3] = {255, 255, 255};
00129     #endif
00130     float hue = 0, sat = 0, val = 0, lum = 0, u = 0, v = 0;
00131     float col[4], finalcol[4];
00132 
00133     glBlendFunc(GL_SRC_ALPHA, GL_ONE_MINUS_SRC_ALPHA);
00134     glEnable(GL_BLEND);
00135 
00136     /* noisy, high contrast make impossible to read if lower alpha is used. */
00137     glColor4ub(0, 0, 0, 190);
00138     glRecti(0.0, 0.0, ar->winrct.xmax - ar->winrct.xmin + 1, 20);
00139     glDisable(GL_BLEND);
00140 
00141     BLF_size(blf_mono_font, 11, 72);
00142 
00143     glColor3ub(255, 255, 255);
00144     BLI_snprintf(str, sizeof(str), "X:%-4d  Y:%-4d |", x, y);
00145     // UI_DrawString(6, 6, str); // works ok but fixed width is nicer.
00146     BLF_position(blf_mono_font, dx, 6, 0);
00147     BLF_draw_ascii(blf_mono_font, str, sizeof(str));
00148     dx += BLF_width(blf_mono_font, str);
00149 
00150     if (zp) {
00151         glColor3ub(255, 255, 255);
00152         BLI_snprintf(str, sizeof(str), " Z:%-.4f |", 0.5f + 0.5f * (((float)*zp) / (float)0x7fffffff));
00153         BLF_position(blf_mono_font, dx, 6, 0);
00154         BLF_draw_ascii(blf_mono_font, str, sizeof(str));
00155         dx += BLF_width(blf_mono_font, str);
00156     }
00157     if (zpf) {
00158         glColor3ub(255, 255, 255);
00159         BLI_snprintf(str, sizeof(str), " Z:%-.3f |", *zpf);
00160         BLF_position(blf_mono_font, dx, 6, 0);
00161         BLF_draw_ascii(blf_mono_font, str, sizeof(str));
00162         dx += BLF_width(blf_mono_font, str);
00163     }
00164 
00165     if (channels >= 3) {
00166         glColor3ubv(red);
00167         if (fp)
00168             BLI_snprintf(str, sizeof(str), "  R:%-.4f", fp[0]);
00169         else if (cp)
00170             BLI_snprintf(str, sizeof(str), "  R:%-3d", cp[0]);
00171         else
00172             BLI_snprintf(str, sizeof(str), "  R:-");
00173         BLF_position(blf_mono_font, dx, 6, 0);
00174         BLF_draw_ascii(blf_mono_font, str, sizeof(str));
00175         dx += BLF_width(blf_mono_font, str);
00176         
00177         glColor3ubv(green);
00178         if (fp)
00179             BLI_snprintf(str, sizeof(str), "  G:%-.4f", fp[1]);
00180         else if (cp)
00181             BLI_snprintf(str, sizeof(str), "  G:%-3d", cp[1]);
00182         else
00183             BLI_snprintf(str, sizeof(str), "  G:-");
00184         BLF_position(blf_mono_font, dx, 6, 0);
00185         BLF_draw_ascii(blf_mono_font, str, sizeof(str));
00186         dx += BLF_width(blf_mono_font, str);
00187         
00188         glColor3ubv(blue);
00189         if (fp)
00190             BLI_snprintf(str, sizeof(str), "  B:%-.4f", fp[2]);
00191         else if (cp)
00192             BLI_snprintf(str, sizeof(str), "  B:%-3d", cp[2]);
00193         else
00194             BLI_snprintf(str, sizeof(str), "  B:-");
00195         BLF_position(blf_mono_font, dx, 6, 0);
00196         BLF_draw_ascii(blf_mono_font, str, sizeof(str));
00197         dx += BLF_width(blf_mono_font, str);
00198         
00199         if (channels == 4) {
00200             glColor3ub(255, 255, 255);
00201             if (fp)
00202                 BLI_snprintf(str, sizeof(str), "  A:%-.4f", fp[3]);
00203             else if (cp)
00204                 BLI_snprintf(str, sizeof(str), "  A:%-3d", cp[3]);
00205             else
00206                 BLI_snprintf(str, sizeof(str), "- ");
00207             BLF_position(blf_mono_font, dx, 6, 0);
00208             BLF_draw_ascii(blf_mono_font, str, sizeof(str));
00209             dx += BLF_width(blf_mono_font, str);
00210         }
00211     }
00212     
00213     /* color rectangle */
00214     if (channels == 1) {
00215         if (fp) {
00216             col[0] = col[1] = col[2] = fp[0];
00217         }
00218         else if (cp) {
00219             col[0] = col[1] = col[2] = (float)cp[0] / 255.0f;
00220         }
00221         else {
00222             col[0] = col[1] = col[2] = 0.0f;
00223         }
00224         col[3] = 1.0f;
00225     }
00226     else if (channels == 3) {
00227         if (fp) {
00228             copy_v3_v3(col, fp);
00229         }
00230         else if (cp) {
00231             rgb_uchar_to_float(col, cp);
00232         }
00233         else {
00234             zero_v3(col);
00235         }
00236         col[3] = 1.0f;
00237     }
00238     else if (channels == 4) {
00239         if (fp)
00240             copy_v4_v4(col, fp);
00241         else if (cp) {
00242             rgba_uchar_to_float(col, cp);
00243         }
00244         else {
00245             zero_v4(col);
00246         }
00247     }
00248     else {
00249         BLI_assert(0);
00250         zero_v4(col);
00251     }
00252 
00253     if (color_manage) {
00254         linearrgb_to_srgb_v4(finalcol, col);
00255     }
00256     else {
00257         copy_v4_v4(finalcol, col);
00258     }
00259     glDisable(GL_BLEND);
00260     glColor3fv(finalcol);
00261     dx += 5;
00262     glBegin(GL_QUADS);
00263     glVertex2f(dx, 3);
00264     glVertex2f(dx, 17);
00265     glVertex2f(dx + 30, 17);
00266     glVertex2f(dx + 30, 3);
00267     glEnd();
00268 
00269     /* draw outline */
00270     glColor3ub(128, 128, 128);
00271     glBegin(GL_LINE_LOOP);
00272     glVertex2f(dx, 3);
00273     glVertex2f(dx, 17);
00274     glVertex2f(dx + 30, 17);
00275     glVertex2f(dx + 30, 3);
00276     glEnd();
00277 
00278     dx += 35;
00279 
00280     glColor3ub(255, 255, 255);
00281     if (channels == 1) {
00282         if (fp) {
00283             rgb_to_hsv(fp[0], fp[0], fp[0], &hue, &sat, &val);
00284             rgb_to_yuv(fp[0], fp[0], fp[0], &lum, &u, &v);
00285         }
00286         else if (cp) {
00287             rgb_to_hsv((float)cp[0] / 255.0f, (float)cp[0] / 255.0f, (float)cp[0] / 255.0f, &hue, &sat, &val);
00288             rgb_to_yuv((float)cp[0] / 255.0f, (float)cp[0] / 255.0f, (float)cp[0] / 255.0f, &lum, &u, &v);
00289         }
00290         
00291         BLI_snprintf(str, sizeof(str), "V:%-.4f", val);
00292         BLF_position(blf_mono_font, dx, 6, 0);
00293         BLF_draw_ascii(blf_mono_font, str, sizeof(str));
00294         dx += BLF_width(blf_mono_font, str);
00295 
00296         BLI_snprintf(str, sizeof(str), "   L:%-.4f", lum);
00297         BLF_position(blf_mono_font, dx, 6, 0);
00298         BLF_draw_ascii(blf_mono_font, str, sizeof(str));
00299         dx += BLF_width(blf_mono_font, str);
00300     }
00301     else if (channels >= 3) {
00302         if (fp) {
00303             rgb_to_hsv(fp[0], fp[1], fp[2], &hue, &sat, &val);
00304             rgb_to_yuv(fp[0], fp[1], fp[2], &lum, &u, &v);
00305         }
00306         else if (cp) {
00307             rgb_to_hsv((float)cp[0] / 255.0f, (float)cp[1] / 255.0f, (float)cp[2] / 255.0f, &hue, &sat, &val);
00308             rgb_to_yuv((float)cp[0] / 255.0f, (float)cp[1] / 255.0f, (float)cp[2] / 255.0f, &lum, &u, &v);
00309         }
00310 
00311         BLI_snprintf(str, sizeof(str), "H:%-.4f", hue);
00312         BLF_position(blf_mono_font, dx, 6, 0);
00313         BLF_draw_ascii(blf_mono_font, str, sizeof(str));
00314         dx += BLF_width(blf_mono_font, str);
00315 
00316         BLI_snprintf(str, sizeof(str), "  S:%-.4f", sat);
00317         BLF_position(blf_mono_font, dx, 6, 0);
00318         BLF_draw_ascii(blf_mono_font, str, sizeof(str));
00319         dx += BLF_width(blf_mono_font, str);
00320 
00321         BLI_snprintf(str, sizeof(str), "  V:%-.4f", val);
00322         BLF_position(blf_mono_font, dx, 6, 0);
00323         BLF_draw_ascii(blf_mono_font, str, sizeof(str));
00324         dx += BLF_width(blf_mono_font, str);
00325 
00326         BLI_snprintf(str, sizeof(str), "   L:%-.4f", lum);
00327         BLF_position(blf_mono_font, dx, 6, 0);
00328         BLF_draw_ascii(blf_mono_font, str, sizeof(str));
00329         dx += BLF_width(blf_mono_font, str);
00330     }
00331 
00332     (void)dx;
00333 }

00335 /* image drawing */

00337 static void draw_image_grid(ARegion *ar, float zoomx, float zoomy)
00338 {
00339     float gridsize, gridstep = 1.0f / 32.0f;
00340     float fac, blendfac;
00341     int x1, y1, x2, y2;
00342     
00343     /* the image is located inside (0,0),(1, 1) as set by view2d */
00344     UI_ThemeColorShade(TH_BACK, 20);
00345 
00346     UI_view2d_to_region_no_clip(&ar->v2d, 0.0f, 0.0f, &x1, &y1);
00347     UI_view2d_to_region_no_clip(&ar->v2d, 1.0f, 1.0f, &x2, &y2);
00348     glRectf(x1, y1, x2, y2);
00349 
00350     /* gridsize adapted to zoom level */
00351     gridsize = 0.5f * (zoomx + zoomy);
00352     if (gridsize <= 0.0f) return;
00353     
00354     if (gridsize < 1.0f) {
00355         while (gridsize < 1.0f) {
00356             gridsize *= 4.0f;
00357             gridstep *= 4.0f;
00358         }
00359     }
00360     else {
00361         while (gridsize >= 4.0f) {
00362             gridsize /= 4.0f;
00363             gridstep /= 4.0f;
00364         }
00365     }
00366     
00367     /* the fine resolution level */
00368     blendfac = 0.25f * gridsize - floorf(0.25f * gridsize);
00369     CLAMP(blendfac, 0.0f, 1.0f);
00370     UI_ThemeColorShade(TH_BACK, (int)(20.0f * (1.0f - blendfac)));
00371     
00372     fac = 0.0f;
00373     glBegin(GL_LINES);
00374     while (fac < 1.0f) {
00375         glVertex2f(x1, y1 * (1.0f - fac) + y2 * fac);
00376         glVertex2f(x2, y1 * (1.0f - fac) + y2 * fac);
00377         glVertex2f(x1 * (1.0f - fac) + x2 * fac, y1);
00378         glVertex2f(x1 * (1.0f - fac) + x2 * fac, y2);
00379         fac += gridstep;
00380     }
00381     
00382     /* the large resolution level */
00383     UI_ThemeColor(TH_BACK);
00384     
00385     fac = 0.0f;
00386     while (fac < 1.0f) {
00387         glVertex2f(x1, y1 * (1.0f - fac) + y2 * fac);
00388         glVertex2f(x2, y1 * (1.0f - fac) + y2 * fac);
00389         glVertex2f(x1 * (1.0f - fac) + x2 * fac, y1);
00390         glVertex2f(x1 * (1.0f - fac) + x2 * fac, y2);
00391         fac += 4.0f * gridstep;
00392     }
00393     glEnd();
00394 }
00395 
00396 static void sima_draw_alpha_pixels(float x1, float y1, int rectx, int recty, unsigned int *recti)
00397 {
00398     
00399     /* swap bytes, so alpha is most significant one, then just draw it as luminance int */
00400     if (ENDIAN_ORDER == B_ENDIAN)
00401         glPixelStorei(GL_UNPACK_SWAP_BYTES, 1);
00402 
00403     glaDrawPixelsSafe(x1, y1, rectx, recty, rectx, GL_LUMINANCE, GL_UNSIGNED_INT, recti);
00404     glPixelStorei(GL_UNPACK_SWAP_BYTES, 0);
00405 }
00406 
00407 static void sima_draw_alpha_pixelsf(float x1, float y1, int rectx, int recty, float *rectf)
00408 {
00409     float *trectf = MEM_mallocN(rectx * recty * 4, "temp");
00410     int a, b;
00411     
00412     for (a = rectx * recty - 1, b = 4 * a + 3; a >= 0; a--, b -= 4)
00413         trectf[a] = rectf[b];
00414     
00415     glaDrawPixelsSafe(x1, y1, rectx, recty, rectx, GL_LUMINANCE, GL_FLOAT, trectf);
00416     MEM_freeN(trectf);
00417     /* ogl trick below is slower... (on ATI 9600) */
00418 //  glColorMask(1, 0, 0, 0);
00419 //  glaDrawPixelsSafe(x1, y1, rectx, recty, rectx, GL_RGBA, GL_FLOAT, rectf+3);
00420 //  glColorMask(0, 1, 0, 0);
00421 //  glaDrawPixelsSafe(x1, y1, rectx, recty, rectx, GL_RGBA, GL_FLOAT, rectf+2);
00422 //  glColorMask(0, 0, 1, 0);
00423 //  glaDrawPixelsSafe(x1, y1, rectx, recty, rectx, GL_RGBA, GL_FLOAT, rectf+1);
00424 //  glColorMask(1, 1, 1, 1);
00425 }
00426 
00427 static void sima_draw_zbuf_pixels(float x1, float y1, int rectx, int recty, int *recti)
00428 {
00429     /* zbuffer values are signed, so we need to shift color range */
00430     glPixelTransferf(GL_RED_SCALE, 0.5f);
00431     glPixelTransferf(GL_GREEN_SCALE, 0.5f);
00432     glPixelTransferf(GL_BLUE_SCALE, 0.5f);
00433     glPixelTransferf(GL_RED_BIAS, 0.5f);
00434     glPixelTransferf(GL_GREEN_BIAS, 0.5f);
00435     glPixelTransferf(GL_BLUE_BIAS, 0.5f);
00436     
00437     glaDrawPixelsSafe(x1, y1, rectx, recty, rectx, GL_LUMINANCE, GL_INT, recti);
00438     
00439     glPixelTransferf(GL_RED_SCALE, 1.0f);
00440     glPixelTransferf(GL_GREEN_SCALE, 1.0f);
00441     glPixelTransferf(GL_BLUE_SCALE, 1.0f);
00442     glPixelTransferf(GL_RED_BIAS, 0.0f);
00443     glPixelTransferf(GL_GREEN_BIAS, 0.0f);
00444     glPixelTransferf(GL_BLUE_BIAS, 0.0f);
00445 }
00446 
00447 static void sima_draw_zbuffloat_pixels(Scene *scene, float x1, float y1, int rectx, int recty, float *rect_float)
00448 {
00449     float bias, scale, *rectf, clipend;
00450     int a;
00451     
00452     if (scene->camera && scene->camera->type == OB_CAMERA) {
00453         bias = ((Camera *)scene->camera->data)->clipsta;
00454         clipend = ((Camera *)scene->camera->data)->clipend;
00455         scale = 1.0f / (clipend - bias);
00456     }
00457     else {
00458         bias = 0.1f;
00459         scale = 0.01f;
00460         clipend = 100.0f;
00461     }
00462     
00463     rectf = MEM_mallocN(rectx * recty * 4, "temp");
00464     for (a = rectx * recty - 1; a >= 0; a--) {
00465         if (rect_float[a] > clipend)
00466             rectf[a] = 0.0f;
00467         else if (rect_float[a] < bias)
00468             rectf[a] = 1.0f;
00469         else {
00470             rectf[a] = 1.0f - (rect_float[a] - bias) * scale;
00471             rectf[a] *= rectf[a];
00472         }
00473     }
00474     glaDrawPixelsSafe(x1, y1, rectx, recty, rectx, GL_LUMINANCE, GL_FLOAT, rectf);
00475     
00476     MEM_freeN(rectf);
00477 }
00478 
00479 static void draw_image_buffer(SpaceImage *sima, ARegion *ar, Scene *scene, Image *ima, ImBuf *ibuf, float fx, float fy, float zoomx, float zoomy)
00480 {
00481     int x, y;
00482     int color_manage = scene->r.color_mgt_flag & R_COLOR_MANAGEMENT;
00483 
00484     /* set zoom */
00485     glPixelZoom(zoomx, zoomy);
00486 
00487     /* find window pixel coordinates of origin */
00488     UI_view2d_to_region_no_clip(&ar->v2d, fx, fy, &x, &y);
00489 
00490     /* this part is generic image display */
00491     if (sima->flag & SI_SHOW_ALPHA) {
00492         if (ibuf->rect)
00493             sima_draw_alpha_pixels(x, y, ibuf->x, ibuf->y, ibuf->rect);
00494         else if (ibuf->rect_float && ibuf->channels == 4)
00495             sima_draw_alpha_pixelsf(x, y, ibuf->x, ibuf->y, ibuf->rect_float);
00496     }
00497     else if (sima->flag & SI_SHOW_ZBUF && (ibuf->zbuf || ibuf->zbuf_float || (ibuf->channels == 1))) {
00498         if (ibuf->zbuf)
00499             sima_draw_zbuf_pixels(x, y, ibuf->x, ibuf->y, ibuf->zbuf);
00500         else if (ibuf->zbuf_float)
00501             sima_draw_zbuffloat_pixels(scene, x, y, ibuf->x, ibuf->y, ibuf->zbuf_float);
00502         else if (ibuf->channels == 1)
00503             sima_draw_zbuffloat_pixels(scene, x, y, ibuf->x, ibuf->y, ibuf->rect_float);
00504     }
00505     else {
00506         if (sima->flag & SI_USE_ALPHA) {
00507             fdrawcheckerboard(x, y, x + ibuf->x * zoomx, y + ibuf->y * zoomy);
00508 
00509             glEnable(GL_BLEND);
00510             glBlendFunc(GL_SRC_ALPHA, GL_ONE_MINUS_SRC_ALPHA);
00511         }
00512 
00513         /* we don't draw floats buffers directly but
00514          * convert them, and optionally apply curves */
00515         image_verify_buffer_float(ima, ibuf, color_manage);
00516 
00517         if (ibuf->rect)
00518             glaDrawPixelsSafe(x, y, ibuf->x, ibuf->y, ibuf->x, GL_RGBA, GL_UNSIGNED_BYTE, ibuf->rect);
00519 #if 0
00520         else
00521             glaDrawPixelsSafe(x, y, ibuf->x, ibuf->y, ibuf->x, GL_RGBA, GL_FLOAT, ibuf->rect_float);
00522 #endif
00523         
00524         if (sima->flag & SI_USE_ALPHA)
00525             glDisable(GL_BLEND);
00526     }
00527 
00528     /* reset zoom */
00529     glPixelZoom(1.0f, 1.0f);
00530 }
00531 
00532 static unsigned int *get_part_from_ibuf(ImBuf *ibuf, short startx, short starty, short endx, short endy)
00533 {
00534     unsigned int *rt, *rp, *rectmain;
00535     short y, heigth, len;
00536 
00537     /* the right offset in rectot */
00538 
00539     rt = ibuf->rect + (starty * ibuf->x + startx);
00540 
00541     len = (endx - startx);
00542     heigth = (endy - starty);
00543 
00544     rp = rectmain = MEM_mallocN(heigth * len * sizeof(int), "rect");
00545     
00546     for (y = 0; y < heigth; y++) {
00547         memcpy(rp, rt, len * 4);
00548         rt += ibuf->x;
00549         rp += len;
00550     }
00551     return rectmain;
00552 }
00553 
00554 static void draw_image_buffer_tiled(SpaceImage *sima, ARegion *ar, Scene *scene, Image *ima, ImBuf *ibuf, float fx, float fy, float zoomx, float zoomy)
00555 {
00556     unsigned int *rect;
00557     int dx, dy, sx, sy, x, y;
00558     int color_manage = scene->r.color_mgt_flag & R_COLOR_MANAGEMENT;
00559 
00560     /* verify valid values, just leave this a while */
00561     if (ima->xrep < 1) return;
00562     if (ima->yrep < 1) return;
00563     
00564     glPixelZoom(zoomx, zoomy);
00565 
00566     if (sima->curtile >= ima->xrep * ima->yrep)
00567         sima->curtile = ima->xrep * ima->yrep - 1;
00568     
00569     /* create char buffer from float if needed */
00570     image_verify_buffer_float(ima, ibuf, color_manage);
00571 
00572     /* retrieve part of image buffer */
00573     dx = ibuf->x / ima->xrep;
00574     dy = ibuf->y / ima->yrep;
00575     sx = (sima->curtile % ima->xrep) * dx;
00576     sy = (sima->curtile / ima->xrep) * dy;
00577     rect = get_part_from_ibuf(ibuf, sx, sy, sx + dx, sy + dy);
00578     
00579     /* draw repeated */
00580     for (sy = 0; sy + dy <= ibuf->y; sy += dy) {
00581         for (sx = 0; sx + dx <= ibuf->x; sx += dx) {
00582             UI_view2d_to_region_no_clip(&ar->v2d, fx + (float)sx / (float)ibuf->x, fy + (float)sy / (float)ibuf->y, &x, &y);
00583 
00584             glaDrawPixelsSafe(x, y, dx, dy, dx, GL_RGBA, GL_UNSIGNED_BYTE, rect);
00585         }
00586     }
00587 
00588     glPixelZoom(1.0f, 1.0f);
00589 
00590     MEM_freeN(rect);
00591 }
00592 
00593 static void draw_image_buffer_repeated(SpaceImage *sima, ARegion *ar, Scene *scene, Image *ima, ImBuf *ibuf, float zoomx, float zoomy)
00594 {
00595     const double time_current = PIL_check_seconds_timer();
00596 
00597     const int xmax = ceil(ar->v2d.cur.xmax);
00598     const int ymax = ceil(ar->v2d.cur.ymax);
00599     const int xmin = floor(ar->v2d.cur.xmin);
00600     const int ymin = floor(ar->v2d.cur.ymin);
00601 
00602     int x;
00603 
00604     for (x = xmin; x < xmax; x++) {
00605         int y;
00606         for (y = ymin; y < ymax; y++) {
00607             if (ima && (ima->tpageflag & IMA_TILES))
00608                 draw_image_buffer_tiled(sima, ar, scene, ima, ibuf, x, y, zoomx, zoomy);
00609             else
00610                 draw_image_buffer(sima, ar, scene, ima, ibuf, x, y, zoomx, zoomy);
00611 
00612             /* only draw until running out of time */
00613             if ((PIL_check_seconds_timer() - time_current) > 0.25)
00614                 return;
00615         }
00616     }
00617 }

00621 /* draw grease pencil */
00622 void draw_image_grease_pencil(bContext *C, short onlyv2d)
00623 {
00624     /* draw in View2D space? */
00625     if (onlyv2d) {
00626         /* assume that UI_view2d_ortho(C) has been called... */
00627         SpaceImage *sima = (SpaceImage *)CTX_wm_space_data(C);
00628         void *lock;
00629         ImBuf *ibuf = ED_space_image_acquire_buffer(sima, &lock);
00630         
00631         /* draw grease-pencil ('image' strokes) */
00632         //if (sima->flag & SI_DISPGP)
00633         draw_gpencil_2dimage(C, ibuf);
00634 
00635         ED_space_image_release_buffer(sima, lock);
00636     }
00637     else {
00638         /* assume that UI_view2d_restore(C) has been called... */
00639         //SpaceImage *sima= (SpaceImage *)CTX_wm_space_data(C);
00640         
00641         /* draw grease-pencil ('screen' strokes) */
00642         //if (sima->flag & SI_DISPGP)
00643         draw_gpencil_view2d(C, 0);
00644     }
00645 }

00647 /* XXX becomes WM paint cursor */
00648 #if 0
00649 static void draw_image_view_tool(Scene *scene)
00650 {
00651     ToolSettings *settings = scene->toolsettings;
00652     Brush *brush = settings->imapaint.brush;
00653     int mval[2];
00654     float radius;
00655     int draw = 0;
00656 
00657     if (brush) {
00658         if (settings->imapaint.flag & IMAGEPAINT_DRAWING) {
00659             if (settings->imapaint.flag & IMAGEPAINT_DRAW_TOOL_DRAWING)
00660                 draw = 1;
00661         }
00662         else if (settings->imapaint.flag & IMAGEPAINT_DRAW_TOOL)
00663             draw = 1;
00664         
00665         if (draw) {
00666             getmouseco_areawin(mval);
00667 
00668             radius = brush_size(brush) * G.sima->zoom;
00669             fdrawXORcirc(mval[0], mval[1], radius);
00670 
00671             if (brush->innerradius != 1.0) {
00672                 radius *= brush->innerradius;
00673                 fdrawXORcirc(mval[0], mval[1], radius);
00674             }
00675         }
00676     }
00677 }

00679 
00680 static unsigned char *get_alpha_clone_image(Scene *scene, int *width, int *height)
00681 {
00682     Brush *brush = paint_brush(&scene->toolsettings->imapaint.paint);
00683     ImBuf *ibuf;
00684     unsigned int size, alpha;
00685     unsigned char *rect, *cp;
00686 
00687     if (!brush || !brush->clone.image)
00688         return NULL;
00689     
00690     ibuf = BKE_image_get_ibuf(brush->clone.image, NULL);
00691 
00692     if (!ibuf || !ibuf->rect)
00693         return NULL;
00694 
00695     rect = MEM_dupallocN(ibuf->rect);
00696     if (!rect)
00697         return NULL;
00698 
00699     *width = ibuf->x;
00700     *height = ibuf->y;
00701 
00702     size = (*width) * (*height);
00703     alpha = (unsigned char)255 * brush->clone.alpha;
00704     cp = rect;
00705 
00706     while (size-- > 0) {
00707         cp[3] = alpha;
00708         cp += 4;
00709     }
00710 
00711     return rect;
00712 }
00713 
00714 static void draw_image_paint_helpers(ARegion *ar, Scene *scene, float zoomx, float zoomy)
00715 {
00716     Brush *brush;
00717     int x, y, w, h;
00718     unsigned char *clonerect;
00719 
00720     brush = paint_brush(&scene->toolsettings->imapaint.paint);
00721 
00722     if (brush && (brush->imagepaint_tool == PAINT_TOOL_CLONE)) {
00723         /* this is not very efficient, but glDrawPixels doesn't allow
00724          * drawing with alpha */
00725         clonerect = get_alpha_clone_image(scene, &w, &h);
00726 
00727         if (clonerect) {
00728             UI_view2d_to_region_no_clip(&ar->v2d, brush->clone.offset[0], brush->clone.offset[1], &x, &y);
00729 
00730             glPixelZoom(zoomx, zoomy);
00731 
00732             glEnable(GL_BLEND);
00733             glBlendFunc(GL_SRC_ALPHA, GL_ONE_MINUS_SRC_ALPHA);
00734             glaDrawPixelsSafe(x, y, w, h, w, GL_RGBA, GL_UNSIGNED_BYTE, clonerect);
00735             glDisable(GL_BLEND);
00736 
00737             glPixelZoom(1.0, 1.0);
00738 
00739             MEM_freeN(clonerect);
00740         }
00741     }
00742 }
00743 
00744 /* draw main image area */
00745 
00746 void draw_image_main(SpaceImage *sima, ARegion *ar, Scene *scene)
00747 {
00748     Image *ima;
00749     ImBuf *ibuf;
00750     float zoomx, zoomy;
00751     int show_viewer, show_render;
00752     void *lock;
00753 
00754     /* XXX can we do this in refresh? */
00755 #if 0
00756     what_image(sima);
00757     
00758     if (sima->image) {
00759         ED_image_aspect(sima->image, &xuser_asp, &yuser_asp);
00760         
00761         /* UGLY hack? until now iusers worked fine... but for flipbook viewer we need this */
00762         if (sima->image->type == IMA_TYPE_COMPOSITE) {
00763             ImageUser *iuser = ntree_get_active_iuser(scene->nodetree);
00764             if (iuser) {
00765                 BKE_image_user_calc_imanr(iuser, scene->r.cfra, 0);
00766                 sima->iuser = *iuser;
00767             }
00768         }
00769         /* and we check for spare */
00770         ibuf = ED_space_image_buffer(sima);
00771     }
00772 #endif
00773 
00774     /* retrieve the image and information about it */
00775     ima = ED_space_image(sima);
00776     ED_space_image_zoom(sima, ar, &zoomx, &zoomy);
00777     ibuf = ED_space_image_acquire_buffer(sima, &lock);
00778 
00779     show_viewer = (ima && ima->source == IMA_SRC_VIEWER);
00780     show_render = (show_viewer && ima->type == IMA_TYPE_R_RESULT);
00781 
00782     /* draw the image or grid */
00783     if (ibuf == NULL)
00784         draw_image_grid(ar, zoomx, zoomy);
00785     else if (sima->flag & SI_DRAW_TILE)
00786         draw_image_buffer_repeated(sima, ar, scene, ima, ibuf, zoomx, zoomy);
00787     else if (ima && (ima->tpageflag & IMA_TILES))
00788         draw_image_buffer_tiled(sima, ar, scene, ima, ibuf, 0.0f, 0.0, zoomx, zoomy);
00789     else
00790         draw_image_buffer(sima, ar, scene, ima, ibuf, 0.0f, 0.0f, zoomx, zoomy);
00791 
00792     /* paint helpers */
00793     if (sima->flag & SI_DRAWTOOL)
00794         draw_image_paint_helpers(ar, scene, zoomx, zoomy);
00795 
00796 
00797     /* XXX integrate this code */
00798 #if 0
00799     if (ibuf) {
00800         float xoffs = 0.0f, yoffs = 0.0f;
00801         
00802         if (image_preview_active(sa, &xim, &yim)) {
00803             xoffs = scene->r.disprect.xmin;
00804             yoffs = scene->r.disprect.ymin;
00805             glColor3ub(0, 0, 0);
00806             calc_image_view(sima, 'f'); 
00807             myortho2(G.v2d->cur.xmin, G.v2d->cur.xmax, G.v2d->cur.ymin, G.v2d->cur.ymax);
00808             glRectf(0.0f, 0.0f, 1.0f, 1.0f);
00809             glLoadIdentity();
00810         }
00811     }
00812 #endif
00813 
00814     ED_space_image_release_buffer(sima, lock);
00815 
00816     /* render info */
00817     if (ima && show_render)
00818         draw_render_info(scene, ima, ar);
00819 }
